mean_cn: n. 左轮手枪；旋转式装置
mean_en: a small gun that has a container for bullets that turns around so that shots can be fired quickly without having to stop to put more bullets in
sentence: The cowboy is holding two revolvers in his hands; you better stay clear!
sentence_trans: 这个牛仔手中拿着两把左轮手枪，你最好离他远点！
word_etyma: re再 ＋ volv旋转，卷 ＋ er表名词 → 子弹旋转打出 → revolver连发左轮手枪，旋转式装置
